Uses of Class
action.Action

  • Packages that use Action 
    Package Description
    action
    This package defines the different types of actions that will be used in the program
    poolstructure
    This package defines the main structure of the program
    resource
    This package defines the different types of resources that will be used in the program
    scheduler
    This package defines the different types of schedulers that will be used to manage the actions
    test  

    • Uses of Action in action

      Subclasses of Action in action 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ForeseeableAction
      This class defines a foreseeable action, which means that we know how many steps this action is made of.
      class  OneStepAction
      This class defines a one step action which means that this action only needs one step to be finished
      Methods in action that return Action 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract Action Action.createAction()
      Creates a new Action according to the object that calls this method

    • Uses of Action in poolstructure

      Subclasses of Action in poolstructure 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Swimmer
      This class defines a swimmer that will have to use several resources when he will go to the pool

    • Uses of Action in resource

      Subclasses of Action in resource 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FreeResourceAction<R extends Resource> 
      class  TakeResourceAction<R extends Resource>
      This class defines a TakeResourceAction that will take baskets and cubicles from the different pools, and it gives them to an user

    • Uses of Action in scheduler

      Subclasses of Action in scheduler 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FairScheduler
      This class defines a fair scheduler that has a current action once this action is finished the fair scheduler will take care of the first non-finished action that is next to this current action
      class  Scheduler
      This class defines a scheduler that will manage actions by using a list of actions
      class  SequentialScheduler
      This class defines a sequential scheduler which takes care of the actions sequentially
      Methods in scheduler that return Action 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Action FairScheduler.nextAction()
      Returns the next action of the scheduler if there is still one action to do
      Methods in scheduler that return types with arguments of type Action 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Action> Scheduler.getListAction()
      It returns the list of action of a scheduler
      Methods in scheduler with parameters of type Action 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Scheduler.addAction(Action a)
      It adds an action to the scheduler
      void Scheduler.removeAction(Action a)
      It removes an action from the scheduler
      void FairScheduler.setCurrentAction(Action currentAction) 
      Constructors in scheduler with parameters of type Action 
      Constructor and Description
      FairScheduler(java.util.List<Action> l, Action currentAction, int index)
      Constructor of a fair scheduler which initializes a fair scheduler with a list of actions and a current action given in parameters
      Constructor parameters in scheduler with type arguments of type Action 
      Constructor and Description

      Constructor of a fair scheduler which initializes a fair scheduler with a list of actions and a current action given in parameters
      Scheduler(java.util.List<Action> l)
      Constructor of a scheduler which initializes a scheduler with a list of actions given in parameters
      SequentialScheduler(java.util.List<Action> l)
      Constructor of a sequential scheduler which initializes a sequential scheduler with the list of actions given in parameters
